colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(CES DPAL LDAN DMAG ZOR GYI RGYAL MO DANG, GNOD SBYIN CHEN PO DREGS PA LCAMS RING LA THUGS RJE BSKUL ZHING BSHAGS PA BYA BA 'DI NI, 'BRUG LO BKRA SHIS LHUN POR 'BRUM NAD KYI 'JIGS PA CHEN PO BYUNG DUS SU RGYAL BSTAN YONGS KYI GSAL @005B MDZAD LO CHEN SPRUL PA'I SKU SHR'I PAndI TA DPA' BO CHEN PO'I BKAS BSKUL ZHING, GTING SKYES PA DGA' BCU SMRA BA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG RDO RJES KYANG BSKUL BA LTAR, ^SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES KYIS SHANGS DGA' LDAN BDE CHEN RAB RGYAS GLING GI GZIMS CHUNG 'CHI MED GUB PA'I PHO BRANG NYI 'OD 'KHYIL DU SBYAR BA'O,, ,,)
